usefulItems: springform tin (Ø 20 cm), baking paper, wire rack, pastry brush, oven
title: Coconut cake

ingredients.content: 100 g sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a springform cake tin (Ø 20 cm) with baking paper.
Place flour, 50 g desiccated coconut, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl then grind <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place eggs and sugar in mixing bowl then mix <b>20 sec/speed 3<b>.

Add yoghurt and oil then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Stir in reserved flour mixture and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b> then scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Mix again <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Pour into prepared tin and bake for 30-35 minutes (180°C). Leave in tin for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Once cool, brush condensed milk over top and sides of cake then sprinkle with grated coconut. Slice to serve.
